element.name: TRoom.Desc
element.descr: a text that descibes the room

element.name: TRoom.Reachable
element.short: the room is reachable from room 1
element.descr: in the geration process the reachability from room 1 indicates that the labyrinth is valid. This means you can reach every room by a treansition.

element.name: TRoom.MappedR
element.descr: the room was visited by the player

element.name: TRoom.MappedT
element.descr: this transition was used or probed by the player.

element.name: TRoom.Transition
element.descr: contains the ID of the next room in that direction or a zero if the direction is blocked

element.name: TGrueStewEng.FRooms
element.descr: this array contains all rooms of the game. arranged by their ID.

element.name: TGrueStewEng.FPlayerRoom
element.short: the room, the player is in

element.name: TGrueStewEng.FPitRoom1
element.short: the first room with a pit

element.name: TGrueStewEng.FPitRoom2
element.short: the second room with a pit

element.name: TGrueStewEng.GetRoom
element.short: Debug: Get the Room by index

element.name: TGrueStewEng.rExit
element.short: Debug: get (the room of) the exit

element.name: TGrueStewEng.rGrue
element.short: Debug: get (the room of) the monster

element.name: TGrueStewEng.rBat1
element.short: Debug: get (the room of) the first bat

element.name: TGrueStewEng.rBat2
element.short: Debug: get (the room of) the second bat

element.name: TGrueStewEng.rPit1
element.short: Debug: get (the room of) the first pit

element.name: TGrueStewEng.rPit2
element.short: Debug: get (the room of) the second pit

element.name: TGrueStewEng.GetDescription
element.short: Gives the description of the game

element.name: TGrueStewEng.ActRoom
element.short: the ID of the room of the player

element.name: TGrueStewEng.Map
element.short: Map-Information of the room twith the player

element.name: TGrueStewEng.KilledMonster
element.short: success: the player has killed the monster

element.name: MyRandom
element.short: a Random number with possible gaps

element.name: NoRoom
element.short: a constant definition of No room

descr.p: 1..20: there is the room with this ID
